data.message: WHAT CAN WE DO? My wife, a "very" prim and proper Brit, has had her Facebook Account DISABLED! UNknown as to why? She is not political, vulgar or nasty to anyone! But 2 days ago her FB account was disabled and we can NOT get back into it. The FB Help pages will not allow her to access them or resolve the issue? HELP please!

replies.message: Hi Tom. We hear your frustration. If you think your wife may have been blocked by mistake, she can file an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2lwStrE. -Joe
